headline: Venezuelan Oil Faces Long Road to Lasting Recovery, Analysts Say
summary: Venezuela could raise production to 2.5 million barrels per day over the next decade, up from the current level of 0.8 million, according to analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co. In the short term, it’s unclear how much oil Venezuela will be able to export due to the political transition and whether flows to China will continue.  And while President Donald Trump has said US companies will spend billions of dollars to rebuild the country’s energy infrastructure over the longer term, there are big doubts about whether the oil majors will want to invest in what is a very uncertain environment.

content.title: Venezuelan Oil Faces Long Road to Lasting Recovery, Analysts Say

In the short term, it’s unclear how much oil Venezuela will be able to export due to the political transition and whether flows to China will continue.  And while President Donald Trump has said US companies will spend billions of dollars to rebuild the country’s energy infrastructure over the longer term, there are big doubts about whether the oil majors will want to invest in what is a very uncertain environment.

headline: Investors Expect the Market to Keep Rallying This Year
summary: 3.7% That's how much Bank of America expects the S&P 500 to increase in 2026. JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs expect the index to rise more. Should the S&P 500 climb for a fourth consecutive year, it would be the longest such streak since 2007.

headline: IDEAYA Biosciences Announces Participation at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
summary: IDEAYA Biosciences, Inc. (NASDAQ: IDYA), a precision medicine oncology company committed to the discovery and development of targeted therapeutics, announced its participation at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference.

headline: Corbus Pharmaceuticals to Present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
summary: NORWOOD, Mass., Jan. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Corbus Pharmaceuticals Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: CRBP), a clinical-stage company focused on oncology and obesity, today announced that Yuval Cohen, Ph.D., Chief Executive Officer of Corbus, will present a corporate overview at the 2026 Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference, to be held January 12-15, 2026, in San Francisco, CA. 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference Format: Presentation and one-on-one investor meetings Date: January 15, 202
